name: IT201-001 Project 1
description:
This app allows you to create Cubes on a given screen. The cubes will slowly move backwards the more you make them. There is a button to clear all of the cubes from the screen, as well as a button to color all cubes that have already been created.

Feature 1: Display Mouse Position Input: Mouse Location Output: Text with the mouse location is displayed in the top right of the screen

Feature 2: Spawn Cubes Input: Mouse Click (Left or Right) Output: Cubes are created at the mouse location, and slowly move backwards the more you create

Feature 3: Change Color of Existing Cubes Input: Dropdown Output: The cubes which have already been created get their colors changed.

Feature 4: Clear All Cubes Input: Button Press Output: All cubes on screen are destroyed
